title: Sentimental Fruits
description: Sentimental Fruits is a collection of a few outstanding short stories in which pictures are used in place of dialogue. That's right, these stories don't have dialogue. The masterful You Gui Xiu's meticulous style allows the characters' voice, feelings, and thoughts to unfold on the page. Because it has not been long since her debut as a manhua artist, many peole admire You Gui Xiu's bravery and will be sure to give her recognition in her future works.
